section_text: Right to access, correction, erase data.

section_title: Cheating by personation using computer resources

section_text: Data must be processed only with free consent.

section_title: Penalty for damage to computer resources
section_text: Unauthorized access or damage to computer systems.
Using another person's digital signatures or passwords.
Threatening national security using computer resources.
All cyber incidents must be reported.
Dishonest or fraudulent use of computer resources.
